parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of elements on one page. Default = 50

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Page value starts from 0

get.description: Get list of payment type of a channel

post.description: Create a payment types of a channel

delete.description: delete payment type of a channel

parameters.name: pspcode
parameters.description: Code of the payment service provider

get.description: Retrieves all the onboarded institutions related to the logged user
Retrieve an institution's primary and secondary keys

post.description: Creates a new subscription for a given Institution and returns its primary and secondary keys

get.description: retrieve all active products for given institution and logged user

channels.description: list of psp and ec channels

Problem.title: Problem

detail.description: Human-readable description of this specific problem.

instance.description: A URI that describes where the problem occurred.

invalidParams.description: A list of invalid parameters details.

title.description: Short human-readable summary of the problem.

type.description: A URL to a page with more details regarding the problem.

Problem.description: A "problem detail" as a way to carry machine-readable details of errors (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7807)

urlBO.description: URL that redirects to the back-office section, where is possible to manage the product

urlPublic.description: URL that redirects to the public information webpage of the product

bearerAuth.description: A bearer token in the format of a JWS and conformed to the specifications included in [RFC8725](https://tools.ietf.org/html/RFC8725)
